WriteGood

A tool for charities and social good organisations that helps guide you through the process of writing stories about the people you work with

Get involved

Tell your clients’ stories. Show your impact.

We’ve worked with a lot of charities and they all have amazing stories to tell about the people they work with. But not all charities have the time or the content writers to show the world how they’ve made a difference.

We want to make the process of telling stories easy and rewarding by giving charities the tools to the create the engaging, captivating stories they have.

Some of the things we’d like to include:

  • - Plain English recommendations
  • - Focussed writing modes
  • - Guided templates to help you create engaging content
  • - Exporting features.

Perhaps you have some suggestions too? Take our questionnaire.

Interested in making our idea better?

Tell us what tools you need to write your stories
